application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by Condition 4 (Trees and landscaping - Details required) of planning permission PP/23/06650 (Variation of condition 2 (compliance with approved drawings) of planning permission PP/22/07899 (Infill rear extension to lower ground floor, modification to front lightwell, extension to existing rear roof terrace, and associated works). The proposed amendments include reducing roof lights from three to one large one on the Lower Ground Floor extension; installation of automatic gates at the front to assist with access and egress including entry system and post box in gate posts aid security measures; changes to front lightwell and stair - proposed infilling of front lightwell is omitted and an emergency escape stair is proposed; landscaping to match discharge of conditions application and amendment to internal layout; changes to the design and form of the glazing bars on the Lower Ground Floor rear external timber frame French doors, removal of a green roof and replacement with a flat roof)
